title: Suspect charged in stray-bullet shooting that critically injured 4-year-old
content:
ATLANTA (CBS46) -
DeKalb County Police said a man who shot a 4-year-old riding a big wheel outside an apartment complex in Atlanta has been charged on Monday.
Thirty-one-year-old Billy Joe Malcolm has been charged with aggravated assault and armed robbery in connection to the shooting, police said on Monday.
Earlier this month, the 4-year-old boy was rushed to the hospital in critical condition, but was later upgraded to stable after he was shot with a stray bullet while playing in the parking lot at the Highlands of East Atlanta apartment complex.
Police said the suspects fired shots at two men who were also in the parking lot, and the child was caught in the crossfire.
